training_captions: LTCC ceramic UWB chip antenna for channel-5 operation around 6.5 GHz; linear polarization with a near-omnidirectional pattern and mid realized peak gain.
Compact three-pad SMD package—one RF feed and two grounds—optimized for mounting at a PCB edge with a small reference ground to achieve high efficiency in the 6.24–6.74 GHz band.
Embedded UWB radiator delivering ~6.5 dBi peak gain and ~70% efficiency on the eval board; performs best with ≥3 mm clearance to nearby metal.
